file.errExtensions: The file {file} is invalid, allowed file types are: {extensions}
file.errMaxSize: The file size for {file} ({size}) exceeds the maximum upload size of {maxSize}
file.errMinSize: The file size for {file} ({size}) needs to be at least {minSize}
file.msgFileOverwriteWarning: The original file will be overwritten if you save your changes, are you sure?
